title: Grapevine/vine typeface
content:
Does anyone know of a grapevine/vine typeface?

My aim is to have it attach to a horizontal line as though growing on it..

Thanks!

 [‹ Miss dem ol' swash & alternates](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154421/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19756 "Go to previous forum topic") [Kerning in real life? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154421/http:/www.typophile.com/node/35258 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Cate iMac

comments.content:
Sounds like you need some custom lettering. :-)

However, I typed the word “vine” into MyFonts.com’s search engine and came up with these [**mixed results**](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154421/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=vine).
Thanks Ricardo! I will definitley be able to build somthing from this. Have a great day :)
Recently I used [Curlz](http://web.archive.org/web/20071102154421/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/monotype/curlz/&sample_text=Grapevine&sample_size=96) to imitate the curling tendrils
